## EnvLightWrapper class

Wrapper for environmant lighting

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class EnvLightWrapper extends Disposable 
```
**Extends:** [Disposable](doc/markdown/./base.disposable.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `EnvLightWrapper` class.
